about_the_game:
Dear Brother is a point and click adventure game series! The game consists of 12 gradually releasing chapters. Mystery and mystical story about young doctor and his family is waiting for you.

Play as if you are watching a TV series - new episodes will be released gradually as updates.



Solve puzzles and uncover the mystery of the Blake family. Play on behalf of different characters, revealing the story from different sides. Each chapter has its own unique plot, which together forms an exciting and fascinating story.

Key features:
  • 12 chapters, depicting the events that happened to the Blake family in each month.
  • Atmospheric drawn 2D graphics.
  • An intriguing and frightening story.
  • Original soundtrack.
  • Achievements. There are more mysteries surrounding the Blake family than at first sight...

The price will increase with the release of each new chapter.
